title: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
writer: Shahzad Ahmed, Mahendra Jakhar, Ketan Mehta
short_cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Radhika Apte, Pankaj Tripathi, Gaurav Dwivedi, Jagat Rawat, Ashraful Haq, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Prashant Narayanan, Urmila Mahanta
cast: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Radhika Apte, Pankaj Tripathi, Gaurav Dwivedi, Jagat Rawat, Ashraful Haq, Tigmanshu Dhulia, Prashant Narayanan, Urmila Mahanta
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: A low-caste laborer uses the meager means at his disposal to carve a path through a mountain that has isolated his community from the outside world.
